name: tauri-plugin-authium-api
author: grcq
description: Plugin for Tauri as a wrapper for Authium.

scripts.release:patch: powershell -Command "pnpm version patch; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:minor: powershell -Command "pnpm version minor; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:major: powershell -Command "pnpm version major; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:alpha:minor: powershell -Command "pnpm version preminor --preid=alpha; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:beta:minor: powershell -Command "pnpm version preminor --preid=beta; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:rc:minor: powershell -Command "pnpm version preminor --preid=rc; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:alpha:major: powershell -Command "pnpm version premajor --preid=alpha; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:beta:major: powershell -Command "pnpm version premajor --preid=beta; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:rc:major: powershell -Command "pnpm version premajor --preid=rc; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:alpha:patch: powershell -Command "pnpm version prepatch --preid=alpha; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
scripts.release:beta:patch: powershell -Command "pnpm version prepatch --preid=beta; pnpm build; cargo set-version (node -p "require('./package.json').version"); cargo publish --dry-run; git add .; git commit -m "Update version"; git push; cargo publish; pnpm publish --access public"
